February 10 analyses (Music Theory IV)

Here are scores for the three sonata expositions analyzed in class on Monday, February 10 (Mozart, K. 281, I.; Beethoven, Op. 2/3, I.; and Haydn Symphony 3, I.). These scores contain my analytical annotations for their sonata structure.

Following is a Spotify playlist with recordings of all three pieces. You can also access it in your Spotify app by searching for "spotify:user:kris.shaffer:playlist:6hyD03UgBvIRLrxis0EOs6".
